Name: Comment

Name: Comment
User Name: REQUIRED: tell the software what alternate meals are provided by the meal source, with a comma separated list
AltMealOptions ()

Name: Comment

AltGroceryOptions ()

Name: Comment
User Name: REQUIRED: tell the software what time to start each driver with a command separated list. This list must have at least as many entries as there are drivers. Accepted formats are 3:00, 3:02 PM, 21:56, 11:21 AM
StartTimes ()

User Name: REQUIRED: tell the software who the ops manager is for the run
